content:
Based on the execution logs, here's the updated report:

# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at Position(0,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at Position(0,0)
- Furnace 2 at Position(2,0)
Both furnaces process iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Plate Production at Position(4,4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line at Position(9.5,11.5)
Complex assembly system consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at Position(6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at Position(7.5,11.5) connecting input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at Position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at Position(11.5,11.5) connecting assembler to output
- Output wooden chest at Position(12.5,11.5) storing finished circuits

### Power Generation System at Position(-7,24.5)
Complete electricity generation setup:
- Offshore pump at Position(-9.5,24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting water flow at Position(-9.5,23.5) to (-7.5,22.5)
- Boiler at Position(-7,24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe at Position(-5.5,24.5)
- Steam engine at Position(-2.5,24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting power to facilities

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when accessing non-existent lab
- Ensure lab entity exists at Position(0.5,28.5) before attempting to access it
- Verify lab placement and coordinates before operations

### Errors with resource shortages
- Monitor coal levels and ensure sufficient fuel for burner entities
- Keep track of raw material inventory (iron plate, copper cable) for assembler operations

### Entity placement verification
- Check if target position is valid before placing new entities
- Verify entity coordinates match the intended placement location
